name: Invisible Beasts
description:
Entry for NaNoReno 2018

Story

Enrico, a navy captain, investigates two mysterious and virulent deaths caused by some animal that can't be found during the carnival period of 1719 in Venice.

Characters








Features
  • 3 endings
  • 2 love interests
  • 5 sprites
  • ~ 15 Cgs
  • CG Gallery
  • 2 languages, English and Italian

WARNING : the game contains blood and violence. The final version will also feature explicit (skippable) sex scenes
